fn.p: Author contributions statement: Conceived the research: AJP, DRS, KSB, DTSH, RS, ARF, SJR, JLNW, AAC. Collected samples: AJP, KSB, DTSH, RS, TL. Provided reagents: CCB, LW, ARF. Performed experiments: AJP, KSB, DTSH, JAB, GC. Analysed data: AJP, DRS, KSB, DTSH, JAB, GC, ARF, SJR, JLNW, AAC. Wrote or revised the manuscript: AJP, KSB, DTSH, JAB, GC, CCB, TL, LW, ARF, SJR, JLNW, AAC. JLNW and AAC contributed equally to this work.
